Name: Big Boss Cat
Content:
ah welcome human intern, it is time for your performance review.
It seems you managed to complete a most of your tasks and made yourself useful to your coworkers.
Unfortunately due to the current state of the finacial market, we have to make cuts to any non-essential members of our work force and we will have to let you go.
Please know that the company and our shareholders appreciate your the effort, time, and unpaid labor you have provided us with today.
 Security will escort you out, to make sure you don't steal or burn anything, we don't need another incident like that again.
